Instance.description: A SuperInteraction that implements GoHere, which utilizes teleport styles to get a Sim from one point to another, while implementing other space- reserving utilities, such as jigs.

TunableVariant.name: destination_jig
TunableVariant.description: If a jig is needed to reserve space where the Sim will teleport to, this should be enabled.

Tunable.name: destination_must_be_outside
Tunable.description: Whether the jig can only be placed outside.

TunableVariant.name: required_destination_surface
TunableVariant.description: If a destination routing surface is required, it should be specified here. If it is not specified, the routing surface of the target will be used to place jigs or to specify a location to teleport to.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The routing surface that must be used when planning a teleport destination.

TunableEnum.name: teleport_style_tuning
TunableEnum.description: Teleport style that is used to get the Sim from their start to end points.
